title: Emu Spew
subject_group: Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Uranium mines and mining - Australia
abstract: Coverage of protests against Beverly Uranium Mining Project.
description: Report on the efforts of the Adnyamathanha people, traditional landowners of the Northern Flinders Rangers to stop the Beverly Uranium Mining Project. The report also covers police action against the protestors and the unsafe method the mining company are using to extract the uranium. Produced as a news story for SKA TV's Access News, a grass-roots alternative to mainstream news and current affairs, broadcast weekly on Melbourne's Community Television station Channel 31 since 1994.
